title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.7 - Psychiatric units
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.7 - Psychiatric units

State Regulations

The psychiatric unit, if included in a hospital as a
separate nursing unit, shall have its program requirements approved by the

Commissioner of the Department of Mental Hygiene. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
712-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
